title: Synthetic Data: AI Trains on AI
description: A fast breakdown of Synthetic Data: AI Trains on AI for builders.

hook.text: We're running out of internet text to train on. The solution? Have AI generate its own training data.

buildup.text: Synthetic data is artificially generated information that mimics the statistical properties of real data.

discovery.text: Models trained on carefully curated synthetic data can match or exceed those trained on real data.

twist.text: But models trained on their own outputs can collapse â€” amplifying errors in a feedback loop.

climax.text: The key is careful curation: synthetic data for diversity, real data for grounding in reality.

punchline.text: AI creating its own textbooks. What could go wrong? Or right?

quiz.question: What risk comes with training AI on synthetic data?
options: Models can amplify errors in a feedback loop
